it.polimi.travlendarplus.RESTful

Class HttpResponseBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.travlendarplus.RESTful.HttpResponseBuilder

  • public class HttpResponseBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provide a set of static methods that are used to build all the HTTP responses sent by Travlendar+ application server

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HttpResponseBuilder()

      Builds a response with a 400 Bad Request status code
      static javax.ws.rs.core.Response buildAlreadyScheduledResponse(AlreadyScheduledException e)
      Builds a response with a 400 Bad Request status code and a list string that states which fields have been mistaken in the request in the message body

      Builds a response with a 400 Bad Request status code and a string message in the body
